title: Must we send salutations upon Prophet (durood) before reciting the dua of istikhara? Assim al hakeem
transcript: Nadia from Saudi Arabia she says we know that all Dua is blocked as long as you do not perform the Salat the salutation upon the prophet so what about first of all there are General duas and there are prescribed duas the general duas you apply this Hadith upon them so you want to ask Allah to cure my son or daughter so I say oh Allah cure my son or my daughter no problem this is General Dua but if I'm going to say the prophet when he taught us he did not tell us to praise Allah and to offer salutation then make the Dua so we go straight for the Dua uh
